body.name: Erivess Portable Twin Tub Washing Machine, Buy 1(washer) Get 1(Dry Rack) Free! 11lbs Washer Mini Compact Laundry Machine and 7lbs Spinner, Semi-automatic Washer Combo for Dorms, Apartments(white)
features: 🥼Easy to Operate: Our portable mini compact twin tub washing machine saves you time and effort by eliminating the need to go to the laundromat or wash things by hand in the tub. Large Capacity: The washing tub has a rated capacity of 11 lbs and the spinner dryer has a capacity of 7 lbs. Perfect for small loads.
👕Powerful Wash and Spin: With 300W washing power and 110W spinner power, our machine will help you save much effort on washing.
👖Buy One Get One for Free: In addition to the mini washing machine, you'll also receive a drying rack, making it easy to wash and dry clothes in one purchase.

👔Compact Twin Tub Design: Convenient for home use with a filter net on the side of the washing barrel for quick filtering and easy cleaning. The cover plate needs to be put above the clothes inside when using the spin tub to avoid high speed shaking and spinning. Easy assembly is required with all accessories packed in the package.

🧦Time, Space, and Money Saver: The washing cycle is up to 15 minutes and the spinning cycle is up to 5 minutes each load, saving you valuable time. The overall dimension is 27" x 15" x 32" inches, making it suitable for limited space. No installation is required. Compared to going to the laundromat and paying for laundry, you only need to pay for thirty trips to have our washing machine forever!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The washing cycle is up to 15 minutes, and the spinning cycle is up to 5 minutes per load, saving you valuable time as well. No installation is required, and all accessories are included, making it easy to assemble and use right away.The Erivess Portable Twin Tub Washing Machine is a great investment for anyone looking to save money on laundry while also enjoying the convenience of washing clothes at home.

Clothes Drying rack is included Once have, all functions included（washing+spinning+Clothes Drying Racks) With the Erivess Portable Twin Tub Washing Machine, you can save a significant amount of money in the long run. No more costly trips to the laundromat or expensive dry cleaning bills. This mini compact washer is perfect for those on a budget who want to save money and time.

With a 240W washing power and 110W spinner power, this washer is powerful enough to handle small loads with ease, while also being delicate enough for more fragile fabrics. The 11lbs washing capacity and 7lbs spinner capacity mean that you can wash and dry your clothes quickly and easily.

Two Holes for Water Inlet It has 2 inlet holes on right & left side. You can freely install the hose based on your faucet location. Drain Hose Hung Up Drain hose can be hung up to the side after use.The washer can easily drain water but please note it is mainly supported by Gravity Drain. Transparent Cover Check laundry status at any time Top Lid for Safe Spin Drying Spinner can only make 80%-90% drying which means clothes still need sunshine.

The compact design of this washing machine makes it perfect for those living in apartments, dorms, or RVs, where space is limited. And with the added gift of the drying rack, you can save even more money by air-drying your clothes instead of using a costly dryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This washer saves time it washes and spins you have to rinse by putting clean water in and just letting in drain .and spin ... love that is has a timer on the wash and spin cycles. I did my first 2 loads n this to my 1 load in my Maytag washing machine on just a Rinse and spin cycle. love this machine. I will get another one when needed ...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great solution for dorm room laundry
reviews.reviewText: I bought the largest size portable washer I could find as my niece was constantly coming to our house to do her laundry. In her dorm there isn’t a lot of laundry room options so I bought this to limit her always having to come to our house for clean clothes. The 32 lb washer is a nice size for a standard load of laundry. She can wash her sheets in there also but I don’t think I would attempt to wash a thick comforter in there as it might be too big.The washer is quick and the spin cycle works phenomenal to not leave the clothes soaking wet after being washed, and then she can hang them to dry- I didn’t realize when I bought this that it would come with a free drying rack so that was a bonus!I would think this would also be a great investment for people that travel in their RV often.I had seen other reviews said their drain hose had issues but I felt the washer I purchased has a good seal and had no complaints with the length of the hose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Big let down
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the unit due to I live in a small house so space is limited. Also being a single person I was hoping that it would take some of my laundromat haul a little. I tried just using it for underwear, t-shirts, dish towels and socks. But I would have to run it everyday if not several times a day. The having to fill the wash water and drain it and then refill for rinse. In the end I'm still taking everything to the laundromat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Instruction manual could be better written with a few more details. Couple things were hard to understand and trying to figure it out myself. Was surprised by how good the agitator was . Spinner side holds less so sometimes had to divide my wash loads in half to get them spun dry. Personally, I would have liked the hoses to be longer and the power cord for my situation with set up but was able to adapt. Was pleasantly surprised with how dry the clothes were and didn't need to have them hung up very long to complete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 18lbs model as it was the only available to me here in Hawaii- at double the normal price even. We needed a larger capacity but non to be sold here. We are a family of 4 and I have washed 4 loads thus far on my 1st day of use.This can effectively wash and spin a load size that fits a 7.5 L bucket (1.98 gal) for reference. I do pack it down so maybe 8 L which does slow down the pulsating action some on the wash. The manual does state not to use water temperature above 60°C. I do 2 cycles of wash per load (1 detergent, 1 rinse with vinegar) then load all into the spinner and add more water there. There were no issues with my powder detergent and added boosters like oxyclean not dissolving with cold water like in my normal sized front loader he kenmore. It does spin the clothes dry very well as others have stated. The only time I've felt an off balance load was when it was not packed full.It was able to wash 4 oversized microfiber bath towels in one load and all were able to fit into the spinner at once with no issues.You definitely will need lint traps as there's no filter listed in the manual nor could I see any. I used a stocking but there were still a lot of lint in my bath tub.Not sure how to install the hanger as there were no instructions for it.There's definitely a burning plastic smell when operating but we don't see any smoke or issues with the plug.Some suggestions to make a twin tub machine better running. Purchase a water line hose with a quick connect adapter to connect to your shower head or faucet with an additional diverter so you can fill either side with ease. There's also an adapter sold here to fit to your tub filler as well. You could even use the rinsearoo that is a silicone piece which goes over your water spout. If you don't wanna really do some plumbing but want a water source attached. Do purchase a extension drain hose as it's very short if you don't plan to leave it in your shower or have a low lying drain to route the draining water. A stand or maybe a appliance cart to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget friendly washing machine
reviews.reviewText: The washing machine is not full automatic, so you need to manually operate. It's light, so you are able to move it around. The place where I live has public washer and dryer. But for hygiene, I would like to washing most of my small items by myself. This washing machine frees my hand. I can put it in the bathroom, put the water in it, and place all my clothes in it. Then I just need to select the timer, and let it work.The spin drying is very helpful and powerful. After spinning, most of the clothes will be dry enough, so they don't need dryer any more. Just use the drying rack, hang them up and wait for them to dry.It saves my time. Also, it's very affordable. Very recommended if you don't have a washer and dryer in your unit.

reviews.reviewerName: Le encantó a mi niño, hermoso para regalo de cumpleaños Le encantó a mi niño, hermoso para regalo de cumpleaños
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cumple con las expectativas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does An Amazing Job
reviews.reviewText: I thought it had broken after a small load and not working. I was disappointed and put in for a return. Went on to make sure my electric was working properly and found it had triggered a plug. Fixed that problem and now it is up and running properly. Did 3 loads in it and everything came out clean and fabulous. This will save money in the end which I am thrilled about and I will NOT be returning it since it's such a time and money saver.

Excelente para lavar cargas pequeñas. Ideal para espacios pequeños. Súper fácil de instalar uno mismo. Para que se den una idea , caben dos toallas medianas o un juego de sábanas (cobijas no) y pues el equivalente en ropa. Muy funcional para mí caso que solamente somos mi esposo y yo.
